resources.string: Auto unlock ONLY on slider wake
ENABLED- The set pattern will be disabled while myLock is active
DISABLED- Set up a security pattern from system prefs
You may see the lockscreen visuals when a slower app is restoring.
When a slower app is restoring, a progress message will be displayed.
All keys wake- double press any key to unlock

myLock automatically minimizes the lockscreen. By default, the side buttons remain locked down, but waking the phone with the slider, keypad buttons, or power key will auto unlock. Advanced mode enables all keys to wake and any double press to unlock. If the phone reboots while myLock is running, it will start back up automatically with your preferred settings. Do not attempt to change the security pattern or create one while myLock is enabled. Always uncheck enabled first.

Each time the phone sleeps, the timer begins. If left asleep for the amount of time set, pattern security is restored, disabling myLock. When you unlock the pattern, myLock restarts itself. You must have a pattern enabled and set myLock to secure mode before turning on idle lock.

Please see our faq and troubleshooting pages linked on our site (http://mylockandroid.blogspot.com) first. If you notice an issue that happens consistently, download Log Collector (free from the market) to email us at myLockandroid@gmail.com. Be sure to list the problem symptoms and what other services are running in the Settings->Applications->Running Services screen. I will research the cause of the trouble and code a fix when possible.
